short_summary: Brandon Research and Development Centre (MB) Request for tenders for Building Controls upgrade, Closing Time: June 18, 2024 at 14:00PM EST
description: This is a tender for the building control upgrade services using escrow services
full_summary:
### ET025-250070 - Completion of Building Control Systems Upgrade at the Brandon Research and Development Centre

### Notice and Contract Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4589824318-Doc4590000489
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4589824318
* **Publication Date**: May 27th, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: Amended to June 18th, 2024 at 14:00PM HAE (During the extention, Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time.)

### Background Information
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's (AAFC) Brandon Research and Development Centre in Brandon, Manitoba requires a completed building control systems upgrade.

### Mandatory Pre-Bid Meeting Site Visit
A mandatory site visit will be held on June 6th, 2024 at 13:00h HAC (CST) at the Brandon Research and Development Centre.

### Tendering and Assessment
A competitive process will be used in accordance with the Trade Agreements Act (*Canadian Free Trade Agreement*) for the provision of building and facility construction and maintenance services.

### Tendering Process
Bids must be submitted electronically through Buyandsell via the "alert me" button on the tender notice. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the specified closing time.

### Eligibility Criteria

To be considered eligible to bid on this project, vendors must:
* Be a registered vendor with the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) dpivering Goods and Services (AGS)
* Be able to fulfill the criteria in the Short List Specifications included in the tender package.

### Short List Evaluation
Short list evaluation will consist of a combination of lowest price bidding and other criteria (referenced in the Short List Specifications document) to select the best-ranked vendor.

### Contact Information
For further information, please contact:
* Matthew Virakorn
* Public Work and Government Services Canada  
matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Proposed Contract Date

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Initially proposed to take place in the future at an undetermined date
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Initially proposed to be 2025-05-16

The above is a professional-style format of the rewritten entry. Let me know if you have any questions or need further modifications.  ](mailto:dealer_WRAPMAuERÜD businessmenfooerealparts violetuc
